name: Ghost Dwarf
description: The Ghost Dwarf embodies the restless spirit of a once-living dwarf, with an ethereal appearance and the ability to move through solid objects.
memorable: With abilities like Aura of Defiance and necrotic attacks, it can control the battlefield while being difficult to directly engage due to its incorporeal movement.
goals: It likely seeks to enact vengeance or fulfill unfinished business from its life.
relations: Often found in the company of other undead creatures, especially those in service to dark powers.
environment: Typically found in crypts, abandoned mines, or other dark, secluded areas.
strengths: Highly mobile due to incorporeal movement, can frighten opponents and reduce their hit point maximum.
weaknesses: Sensitive to sunlight, suffering disadvantages in attacks and perception checks in daylight.
attacks: Uses Ghostly Axe for versatile melee or ranged attacks, and Hand of the Grave inflicts significant necrotic damage while reducing hit point maximum.
most_powerful_ability: Prayers Unanswered can frighten multiple foes, establishing control and panic on the battlefield.
senses: Ethereal Sight allows it to see into the Ethereal Plane, providing tactical advantages.
additional_information: Immune to necrotic and poison damage.
Resistance to several elemental damage types.
Advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.
Can perceive entities on the Ethereal Plane.
Can enter the Ethereal Plane for tactical repositioning.
test_queries: ghost that weakens hit point maximum
